conversation.content: What is this in the picture?
Mickey Mouse.
Who is Mickey Mouse?
How don't you know this?! He is the most famous Disney Land character, Mickey Mouse.
What does he do?
He has got somethings in his hands.
What's he got in his hands?
A giant present box and three balloons. I also love the hat he is wearing; people usually wear this at birthday parties.
What can you see in the picture?
This picture looks pretty familiar for you.
Why do you think I should know the conent of the image? what is in the picture?
This is Popeye the Sailor, a famous cartoon character from the 20s.
What's he like?
He has big forearms and always eats spinach.
What else?
He has a pipe in his mouth all the time.
What can you see in the picture?
There are two cartoon characters looking at some food.
What sort of food?
They are looking at some sausages.
What characters are they?
They seem to be dogs, one big brown one and one white and brown, which is smaller.
What is the picture?
Three small animated birds are on one in an ice cube on the beach.
The birds recall me the Angry Birds cartoon.
You guessed correctly.
What are they doing?
All of them are looking at the camera.
What is the picture about?
This picture is from a famous cartoon about a fish looking for her mom.
What do you see in the picture?
In the ocean two fishes are attached to a turtle, and a turtle looks at them and laughs.
Anything else?
There are some other turtles in the background as well.
What can you see in the picture?
The picture shows some adorable animals.
Could you describe them?
They are black and white.
Where do they live?
They are penguins. I think in this picture they live in a zoo because I see some big stones and something like lake.
What is this in the picture?
In this given picture, two lions are in a good relationship.
Are they in the cage?
No, but it appears that they are in the green nature of a zoo in the middle of the day. I love them because they are getting sunbath together.
What are you looikng at?
A picture of an animal.
Is it a wild or domestic animal?
No, it is a wild animal that lives in the jungle or sometimes in a zoo.
Does this animal have a unique nickname?
He is famous for the Empire of Jungle, a male lion.
Does the lion do?
He is lying in a car.
What can you see in this picture?
There is a big butterfly in the middle of the picture.
What else?
Many yellow flowers are in the image, and the brown butterfly is sitting on one of them.
How is the weather?
The weather is sunny.
What are you looing at?
A picture of a woman.
What is the woman doing in the picture?
She is petting a small dog.
How is the woman dressing?
She wears a hijab and a white mask.
Where is the picture taken?
It is a garden, and it is also taken during the day.
What are you looing at
There are many swans by a river.
What time is it?
It is late in the evening.
What else do you see?
There are many people in the given picture and a massive building in the background.
What do you see in the picture?
There are three monkeys on a significant branch of a tree.
What are they doing?
They are all quiet. One is looking the other way, but the other two are looking ahead.
What can you see in the picture?
There is a road and a slight turn to the right at the end of the road. There is a moose in the middle of the road as well.
What else can you see in the picture?
The sky is blue and cloudy, and some grass and bushes are on the two sides of the road.
What's the picture?
There are two cartoon characters called Simpsons riding on a motorbike.
Are they on the road?
No, they are jumping from a high place, and an explosion is behind them.
What do you see in the picture?
I see a cartoon character.
What is it?
It is a yellow bear inside a honey jar whose hands are full of honey.
What else?
There are some bees around him. He is looking at them, and he is wearing a red T-shirt.
What is the picture showing?
The picture shows two very famous cartoon characters.
What are their names?
SpongeBob that is a yellow sponge, and and Patrick Star that is a pink sea star living underwater.
What are they doing in the picture?
They are blowing gum.
What is the picture?
The picture shows the character of a cartoon.
What's more?
Some animals are standing one upon another. In the backgroun, you can see sea and beach. Also, there are some trees.
Can you name the animals?
A hippopotamus, an upside-down giraffe, a zebra, and a lion on top of them.
What do you see in the picture?
This picture shows some penguins on the right side of an orange wall.
What are they doing?
All of them are looking into the camera and are sitting on each other.
Are thez real animals?
No, they are the character of Madagascar cartoon.
What is the picture about?
The picture shows a mouse on a white table.
Is it a regular mouse?
No, this mouse is very famous, and he is a cartoon character.
What is it doing in the picture?
He is holding a piece of cheese.
What is in the picture?
It is somehow a squirrel that is a fictional character in the Ice Age cartoon.
What is it doing?
It seems to be afraid of something and holding its nut very tight.
What is in the picture?
There are two cartoon cats.
What are they doing?
They are holding two swords.
What else?
One of them is wearing a hat with a feather on it. Both of them are wearing belts and have swords.
Where is it taken?
The picture is taken for a poster of a movie.
What do you see in the picture?
There are two cartoon cats.
What are they doing?
Two cartoonish seagulls are sitting on two timbers.
What are they doing?
Each of them is looking somewhere, and the sky is blue.
What is there in the picture?
A white rabbit.
What is it doing?
It is happy because it has a carrot that looks like a key.
What color are its eyes?
They are pale blue.
Is it a real rabbit?
No, it is a cartton character.
What is there in the picture?
It is a painting.
Of what?
The painting is of some goldfish.
Are they all of the same color?
No, one of them is black.
What is the picture?
The picture is a painting, but it is a blur!
What does it mean?
It is a painting of the sea, some cliffs, and rocks, but it needs to be clarified.
What is the picture?
The picture shows a painting of two roses in a vase.
What else?
Nothing especial.
What is the picture?
It shows a big white flower among some other smaller flowers.
What else?
The picture is painted with oil painting.
What is the picture?
The painting is a sink from a high angle.
What is inside the sink?
There is a fish inside the sink by the sinkhole.
Anything else?
The cap for the sinkhole is inside the sink on the right of the sink.
What does the picture show?
The picture is showing some pumpkins.
How many of them?
Four.
Can you add any more details?
It is a painting oil color.
Anything else?
They are in yellow and green colors.
What do you see in the picture?
I can see a painting that is not that professional.
What is it about?
It's a women hugging a child at a birthday party. This picture is used as a memory.
Can you add any more details?
I see a cake, two ballons, flowers in the vase
Anything else?
They are in yellow and green colors.
What can be seen?
It's an oil painting depicting some colorful trees.
What season is it in the picture?
Since the leaves are pink and red, it is the fall.
Where is it?
It's hung on the wall.
Further information?
In the painting, there is a narrow river that you can see the shadow of trees on.
What do you see in the given picture?
I can see a picture of a big city and its harbor.
What detail can you give me?
I can see boats on a lovely big river and buildings and trees in the background.
What can be seen in the picture?
I can see a professional painting.
Painting of what?
Three beautiful cherries which are wet and water is dropping from them.
Are there any other details?
They are hung from a fragile branch, and a lovely leaf is on the top.
What do you see in the picture?
It's an artistic painting that shows a woman's face with some butterflies on it.
Can you see the whole face?
No. It has been painted from a very close distance, and some butterflies cover the face.
What can be seen in the picture?
I can see a package of tea in the picture.
What color is it?
The package is dark blue.
Are there any signs or logos on that?
Yes, there is a red sign and a picture of a teapot.
What do you see in the picture?
I can see a glass of beer.
Is it full?
No, it is almost empty.
Where is the glass?
Someone is holding this glass.
Is there any logo on it?
Yes, there is a blue and red logo on the glass.
What can be seen in the picture?
I can see the box of a cozy heating blanket.
What size is it?
It is written that the blanket is XL.
Is there any picture on the box?
Yes, there is a picture of a woman.
What can be seen in the picture?
It is inside a printer.
What color is the printer?
The printer is black, and there are many inks inside the printer.
What is in the given picture?
This is the bottle of dishwasher detergent liquid.
What color is it?
The bottle is white, but the lead and the sticker are red.
What can be observed from this photo?
This is a white package of pineapple cake.
What is written on the package?
There are some sentences in some Asian language and also the weight of the cake.
Are there any pictures?
Yes, there is a big pineapple on the cake.
What can you see in the given picture?
It is a box.
What box?
Box of filled-in chocolate.
What is the flavor?
It's mint flavor.
What color is the box?
It's purple.
What do you see in the picture?
I can see three boxes.
What boxes are they?
One is the box of an iPad, and another is the box of protective cover that there is an apple pencil with one extra tip on.
Where the picture is taken?
It is taken on a white surface.
What can be seen in the picture?
I can see a pack of dishwashing detergent tab.
Is anything written on it?
Some signs warn people of its danger, and some pictures show how to use it.
What color is the dishwashing detergent tab?
It's blue.
What color is the package?
It's colorless.
What do you see in the picture?
It's a dishwasher.
What else can be seen?
I can see some buttons above and a price tag on them. I can also see an energy label on it.
What is the brand?
It's Bosch.
What can you see in the picture?
I can see a package of dried cherries.
What color is the package?
It's white.
Is there any logo or sign on it?
There is a green logo on the package.
What can be seen in the picture?
I can see a package of crust roast.
What else can you see?
The photo has been taken on a wooden surface.
Is there any sign or logo on it?
Some signs show its nutrition level and its attitude on the package.
What can be seen in the picture?
It's a package of mini cookies.
What kind of cookie is it?
It is a chocolate cookie with pieces of hazelnut for vegan people.
What else can you see o the package?
Besides the photos of the cookies, I can see some signs which show it's a green package.
What can be seen in the picture?
I can see a roof of a mall where there are a lot of colorful umbrellas.
How do you feel when you see this picture?
I feel excited because I enjoy watching colorful stuff, which makes me happy.
What can be seen in the picture?
In this given picture, I can see a nice place with a small lake in the middle of the park.
How does the weather seem in the picture?
The weather is sunny and you can see a lot of clouds in the blue sky.
Is there any flower in this place?
No, there aren't flowers, but it is covered with many green trees.

You can see a big park with two duck statues in this given picture.

It was taken at noon due to the weather being sunny.
What else can be seen in the photo?
You can see a small pond at the end of the park.

I see a little boy in a picture who sits on a swing.

Yes, it is winter because the ground is covered by snow.
Does the boy look at the photographer?
No, he looks behind the scene.

It is a party.
Is it a birthday party?
Yes. it is a birthday, and a man slides a cake.
Is he young?
Yes, he is a young boy.
Where does he celebrate his birthday?
He celebrates his birthday at a restaurant.

I can see a boy who plays with his toys.

Anything else?
There is a b table that the toys are on.

I can see a girl.
Is she doing?
She is lying on the ground where covered with snow.

No, she is wearing dark clothes.

You can see a great city with many people, builidngs and a car.

Because of the sky, it was taken near the sunset. And when I see this picture, it makes me sad I think it is a gloomy day.

I can see a man.
Is the man doing?
The man is beside five bear statues.
Does he feel bad?
No, he is laughing in the picture.

It looks like there are some small droplets coming off the Whale.

The background has several beachfront homes and a clear sky.

A small brown Squirrel.

Eating nuts

No, it's on a tree branch.

A stone building.

It looks like an old historic building.

Doors and windows without glass are visible.
Are there any decorations around the building?
Yes, around it, there are some plants.

Cows a field with a barn.

Two.

They are grazing in front of the fence.

They are light brown and white cows.

I see a crimson train running on a track with mountains all around it on a snowy day.
What sort of train is it?
It has an appearance of a passenger train.
Where is the train heading?
It looks like it's heading towards the mountains.
How does the weather seem in the picture?
The weather is somewhat foggy and the ground is covered by snow.
What are you looking at??
I am looking at an image.
what kind of image is it?
it is an image of a hummingbird flying through the air.

There is only one bird visible.

A small USB sticker with a green and black color scheme.

It is situated on a black surface.
Any further information
No, just that is green on top and black on the bottom.

I'm looking at  an image of a solar panel mounted on a pole.

It's a combination of blue and white.

On a field.

They are drawing power to recharge their batteries.

There are four cars.

A black and silver camera.

It is a Samsung camera.

She's in the water.

The pool appears to be enclosed by a net.

Four.

a man is biking down a street, with a baby seat attached to his bicycle.

here is a cat sitting on a table.

One of the dogs is white and the weather is sunny.

What else is there?
There's a train.

I see a young child sitting on the ground in a hallway surrounded by a bookshelf filled with colorful children's books.
What is the child doing?
The child is reading the book on their lap.
What else do you see?
There are some books on the ground in the right sight of the image.
Hey Jill, what's in the image you have
a library with a hallway that has two bookshelves. At the end of the hallway, there are two tables.
Are tables empty?
No, on one of the tables, two people are working with their laptops. You can only see one person sitting at the other table.
Anything else?
Beside the table leg, there is backpack.

There's a man who might be a farmer.
What is the man doing?
He is sitting on a red tractor.
Where is he?
In a field.
What sort of image are you seeing?
It's a cartoon character, bugs bunny.
Who is bugs bunny?
He is a rabbit, a very famous cartoon character. In this picture, he is laying on the ground. The background is all white. He is eating a carrot as always.
Is he alone in this picture?
Yes.
What color is this rabit?
It looks like a mixture of grey and white.
What image are you looking at?
It's is a drawing of Tom and Jerry. Two famous cartoon characters.
Ohhh, great. Are they fighting as always?
Tom has grabbed Jerry by his tail and with his other hand, he is trying to prevent him from running away.
Where are they struggling?
Not much, Tom seems very confident.
What's in the picture?
Two persons are sitting on chairs. One of them is young and the other one is old.
What are they doing?
The younger man, who appears to be a doctor, is examining the older man's right ear with the otoscope.
Where are they?
A small examination room in a clinic.
Any other information?
Both of them are wearing masks.
Anything else?
I can see other clinical instruments around the room.

In the hospital room, we see a group of people wearing green surgical gowns and masks. They appear to be surgeons.
What are they doing?
They are gathered around a hospital bed.

In one of the surgeons' hands, I can see a newborn baby.

I guess six women are there.

The room has a green color painted on the floor and walls.

Abstract art painting.

A woman playing a violin.

It appears she would be a young.

The painting encompasses many different colors.

oooh, you see a car.

It is located on a wooden floor.

The heater is currently off.

No.

It is a Meeting Owl conference camera is connected by several cables.
Anything else in the image?
Yeah, there's a bottle in the background.
I am so interested to know more about the picture you are looking at.
It's a man riding a donkey. They are coming toward the camera.
Where are they?

They are on the field. Eating fresh grass. You can see them in the middle of the picture. The man is a bit old, the donkey is white and the scene is more of a village. With lots of green soundings and some trees in the background.
How is the weather?
The weather seems a bit cloudy, maybe after or before raining.
Is the atmosphere dark?
No, but not so light too.
What is the man wearing? Costume clothes or casual ones?
He is wearing a coat, a blue one and he is looking at the ground.
What makes this picture more appealing?
It's a very green field with three horses, two of them seem to be pregnant and one is old.
Ooh, cool. Are they in the field?
Yes, they are on the field. Eating fresh grass. You can see them in the middle of the picture.
Are there barns and fences around them?
No, they seem to be free.
What can you see on their left and right side?
Yes, left and right are empty field.
What kind of image are you looking at?
It is a photo of a frog in the water.
Is the frog on the lake or river? Where is it exactly?
It's a pool. The water is so clean and looks fresh.
Can you see a green area around it?
Not much, just the pool and the frog.
What is the frog doing?
Trying to get to the edge of the pool.
Can you tell me about the picture?
This photo is very simple, a dog looking at the camera. The dog is sitting on the grass.
What color is the dog?
It's mostly white with black spots, some very shallow brown ones as well. The dog is happy and its jaw is open.
Are there other specific elements like houses, people, or roads?
No, you would feel like a dog is looking at you. It is a bit close shot.
Hi, I would like to know about the picture you are looking at?
It's a photo of the sea, the sun is setting and the sky can be seen.
Oh, beautiful. Are there any people there?
One can also see the shore, there are few people in the darkness of the scene very far.
What color are the sky and sea?
Sky is a spectrum of red and dark blue. The sea is dark blue with a clear red line mirrored from sunset.
Are people on the beach?
It is very far, all I can see is that one is standing on the beach and one is standing in the water. But it is very far.
Other further information?
Nothing special, just the people are on the left side of the picture.
What do you see in the picture at your fingertips?
I see a dog and a yellow box, something like a telephone line box.
Are they on the street?
No, there is a tiny road near them, but it is more like a village.
Describe the dog, its color and size.
It is a brown German shepherd dog, its back is more black and the legs are more bright.
What is the dog doing?
The dog is looking at the road. There is also a tree on the left side of the image.
What is the picture about?
There are sunflowers in the close shot and sunny weather with some white clouds in the sky.
Is it an agricultural field?
Maybe.
How many sunflowers do you see?
The picture seems to be a close shot of a part of a garden. So, I can see a number of them.
Is there anything else in it?
No.
What do you see?
I can find an airplane in the picture with cloudy and gloomy weather in the background.
Is it flying? Is there any sky?
No, the airline is on the wet runway.
Is it raining?
I can't see the rainfall but based on the weather and the ground it seems it was raining.
What else you see in the image?
Some yellow lines on runway. Also, a small green area on the left side of the picture.
Are there any people or cars in there?
No, there are not any people or cars.
What do you see in the image?
I see a beach where a dog is standing alongside two fishermen and also there is a fishing net.
Is there any fish?
I see a small fish in the fishing net.
What is the dog doing?
The dog is eating a fish from one fisherman's hand.
Is it a long shot or a close one?
It is a close shot.
What is the other fisherman doing?
The second fisherman is standing beside the first one and has gloves. I see just the back of him.
Can you see the sea?
The sea is rough.
How is the weather?
The weather is cloudy and gloomy.
What type of image do you see?
It's a woman who is painting.
What is she painting?
She is painting nature, a tree with white leaves and another tree with pink leaves. There is grass and a road also in the painting.
Is she painting on a canvas?
Yes.
Describe further the lady's atmosphere.
Lady is wearing a black dress, she has yellow and golden hair. She is in the right part of this image.
What size is the canvas?
It seems a big one because it covers most of the image.
Is the woman painting with her left hand?
Yes, left hand.
Tell me about the picture you are looking at.
I see a man and a couple of sheep and a few goats.
Is it a picture of nature?
Yes, and everywhere is green, with a couple of trees in the background and lots of green grass.
Is the man a shepherd?
Yes, he seems to be but he has dressed casually in a blue t-shirt and a branch of a tree in his hand.
How old does the man look?
He seems like 30-40.
What do you see in this image?
It is a close shot, a real photo, of a couple of fruits.
What fruits are they?
A red apple, a green orange, a yellow pear.
Where are these fruits?
They are on a brown table. Also, there is a drawing of them on the table as well. But in the drawing, you only see three pears drawn. Two gray and one yellow. It seems like a drawing lesson example.
Which elements are there in this picture?
An old woman, a few people in the background, and also maybe a town square or alley.
Ooh, it is a picture of a town.
No not a town, but more like a close shot of the old lady. She is wearing hijab (chador) and has a stick to help her walk. But she is sitting. She also has a blue bag in her hand.
Is it a real image?
Yes, it is a photo.
Can you see shops around the old women?
No, but instead I can see a few people walking in the background.
What does this picture include?
There is a dog and a boy.
Where are they?
They are in nature, lots of trees and green grass can be seen.
What color is the dog?
Brown.
Is the dog big or small? Describe the dog a bit more?
It is a brown big dog. It is sitting on the grass.
What does the boy do?
The boy is kindly petting the dog with his left hand. The boy is also seated near the dog on the grass.
How old is the boy?
He is young, maybe around 12.
What does the boy wear?
A white and blue sweatshirt.
How is the weather? Can you see the sky?
The weather is just about to rain. Sky is not seen but you can guess it is dark a bit.
What do you see in this image?
There is a bucket of tomatoes.
What color is the bucket?
It is white. Also, I see a tomato garden. Many tomatoes there but they are not picked yet.
Where is the bucket?
The bucket is in the middle of the picture.
Does the bucket surround with the green atmosphere?
Yes, it is on the ground, the background is the tomato leaves and plants.
How many tomatoes are there in the bucket?
Well, I can't count them but I see more than 10, so filled that probably hard to move the bucket.
Are there any people?
None is in the image.
